    Scatter plot function

    plot_scatter_graph.Rd

    This function plots a scatter graph given the data and the column names to visualize and also allows to edit the graphs axis labels and plot dimensions

    plot_scatter_graph(
  data,
  x_axis_data,
  y_axis_data,
  x_axis_label,
  y_axis_label,
  title_label,
  text_size
)

    Arguments

    data

    The data which should be visualized passed as a dataframe

    x_axis_data

    The column name of the passed data which should be displayed on the x axis passed as a dataframe which is the name of the column

    y_axis_data

    The column name of the passed data which should be displayed on the y axis passed as a dataframe which is the name of the column

    x_axis_label

    Label which will be displayed in the plot for the x axis passed as a string

    y_axis_label

    Label which will be displayed in the plot for the y axis passed as a string

    title_label

    Label which will be displayed on the top of the plot passed as a string

    text_size

    Text size applied for all text in the plot passed as a numeric value

    Value

    The generated plot with the applied parameters

    Contents

    Developed by Rehan Mondal.
